messages.title: It's time for CHANGE
messages.content: Bethnal Green & Bow will be a better served, more inclusive and financially stable constituency under Zakir Khan and the Conservative Party.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will campaign for more police patrolling the street and not sitting behind a desk.
A fair and better deal for tenants and leaseholders. We need to provide the right housing that local people are so desperate for.
We must ensure our young people leave with qualifications as well as skills to succeed in their chosen careers.
We must get our local people into local jobs. We will create new opportunities to help the unemployed get back into work.

issues.education: We must ensure our young people leave with qualifications as well as skills to succeed in their chosen careers.

housing.content: A fair and better deal for tenants and leaseholders. We need to provide the right housing that local people are so desperate for.

contactInformation.address: Docklands Business Centre, 10-16 Tiller Rd, London E14 8PX

images.caption: Zakir Khan shaking hands with an unnamed individual.
